alert.note: Alert for Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 03 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Baker and northern Columbia Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles east of Belmont to 8 miles northeast of Suwannee Valley to Five Points. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Five Points, Winfield, Olustee, Suwannee Valley and Watertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
